items.title: Brain Rules Public Speaking: Maintain Audience Attention

visible_instructors.job_title: Author, YouTuber, Keynote & TEDx Speaker, CEO Rule the Room

items.headline: How to show your audience that in order to get the information they’ve come to hear, they have to listen to you!
objectives_summary: Top Four questions you can use RIGHT AWAY that will get AND keep the attention of your including the most commonly misused type of question (and how to properly execute it to perfection)
How to use directional statements to get your audience to do what you want (whenever you ask them to do it) and techniques to show enthusiasm about a topic, EVEN if you don’t want to be there
An “Active Questions” technique you can use to COMPEL people to respond to your questions that works almost EVERY time

items.title: How Jurors Make Decisions
items.headline: A Neuroscience Approach to Voir Dire and Jury Selection by Robert T. Eglet.
objectives_summary: Conduct Voir Dire and jury selection like an expert. You will learn to utilize and integrate the principles of neuro- and behavioral science in a 6-step process to uncover juror bias and uncover how jurors think and ultimately how they make decisions.

You will learn backround knowledge for why using German CV standards are valuable for you.

Have the capacity to ask powerful, information discovering, talent identifying, people maximizing questions.

items.title: Professional Domestic Cleaning Course by Fantastic Academy

visible_instructors.name: Fantastic
visible_instructors.title: Fantastic Academy
visible_instructors.job_title: Start or upskill your property maintenance business

items.headline: The skills & know-how to make you an expert in domestic cleaning
objectives_summary: How to deal with your clients – how to present yourself and discuss the priorities of the client, how easy to manage the client’s expectations, how to communicate with the client, how to walk your extra mile to the client, and many more useful tips and how-to’s

Perform domestic cleaning as a professional – you will receive a step by step guidance about how to: clean each room of the property – kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, living room etc.; how to do the laundry; how to clean all common areas; how to sort the waste; how to finish the cleaning and prepare the property for the client
We will give you an easy way to organize your working day
